channel.title: Lethium proxy voters!
channel.description:
Lethium server proxy votes,they also sell proxy voting guides on their forums,ban the server from this site.
Pics... http://postimage.org/image/a6nralb8f/full/
Ban it now,its sad,and abusive.

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Unless you can provide something that shows admins or owners showing members how to proxy vote there really isn’t much we can do as it is the players acting on their own. If it was a regular player that posted how to proxy vote it’s not the server owners fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Niobe, post:32, topic:426078”][quote author=Tom_BETA link=topic=528766.msg3857116#msg3857116 date=1324422009]
The fact that the server isn’t stopping them is kind of an indirect way to get more votes I think. Not worth a ban but more a PM about it just getting a few things straight.
[/quote]

They will never stop,trust me,sorry for mentioning this but google gave them 3 tries to stop,and they didnt.[/quote]
Then they’re just abusing their own system tbh.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:17, topic:426078”]But I’ve just tried it myself, the people aren’t abusing Moparscapes systems just the servers. If you notice on the video they’re not actually voting on the sites just clicking the buttons to fool their poorly designed vote4reward system.

So it’s not really unfair.[/quote]
Can’t ban them for clicking. It’s the server who’s being fooled not the MoparScape server status page.

You should have taken this up with the owner or staff like Tom is doing now.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @Nathan_R Nathan R
item.description:
@Nathan_R wrote:

[quote=“Niobe, post:23, topic:426078”]Im not nosy,and it does matter to me.
Ive allready mentioned you get an authcode for voting.
You see the Guides on the forums?FREE PROXY GUIDE.
They get unlegit votes,and its not fair to the other servers who do.
This does deserve a ban,its perfect proof,and i have no idea why you guys just keep on and on about asking and evading to ban that server.
-Its better to be hated for what you are.,than loved for what you arent.
This phrase completely applies to everything,they shouldnt shine when its all corrupt and fraude.[/quote]
So is the United States government, do you see me complaining?

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

Why does this matter to you…?
it doesn’t matter.
I mean We haven’t actually seen them do it
Just because they are selling it, does not mean they bought or they actually work.
Anyone can use a Proxy… Many people don’t follow the rules…

What is a Auth code anyways?

It has not been proven that they actually use a Proxy either :l

Read full topic

[/quote]

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @Niobe Niobe
item.description:
@Niobe wrote:

It does not mean they wont have people doing it for real.
Get this.
100-130 players online.
70-80 players ACTUALLY VOTE.
6k votes by the end of the month.
Tells you what?..
Either-Every single person that votes,does it 80 times in a month (31days).
Or.
Around 5-10 people dedicated to it votes 857 times in a month.
Its outrageous to see such a small server beat in votes servers that have much more players.
IF PROVEN OR NOT PROVEN THAT THEY ACTUALLY DO OR DO NOT VOTE,THERES A POSSIBILITY THAT THEY COULD,AND IT SHOULD NOT BE DRAWN TO AN I THINK KIND OF CHOICE.
Its like this…
If you think someones knows how to dupe in your own server,but you THINK,not actual proof,are you gonna risk it that someday they will dupe?
Applies same to here,they know how to get many votes,but now i have proof,and you shouldnt risk that one day theyll get a massive amount of votes.
I still think the server deserves a ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:

But I’ve just tried it myself, the people aren’t abusing Moparscapes systems just the servers. If you notice on the video they’re not actually voting on the sites just clicking the buttons to fool their poorly designed vote4reward system.

So it’s not really unfair.

Read full topic

item.title: Lethium proxy voters!
item.dc:creator: @Niobe Niobe
item.description:
@Niobe wrote:

Auths you get by voting correctly at all 6 voting sites,including this site,they sell guides on how to vote unlimited times,meaning it boosts up their total votes on this site,so,its pretty much unfair to other servers who have to wait on their players every 24 hours to get their votes.
This is known as proxy voting.
So,they deserve to be kicked or banned from the list.

Read full topic

Read full topic
